content: through remaining sts pull tight and fasten_off mc main color meas measures finishing ndl s needle s using all colors together make 3 diameter pompom and sew p purl to top of hat weave in ends pm place marker repeat repeat round s round s st s stitch es decrease together all efforts were made to make this pattern error-free for questions or support please email info@fairmountfibers com 7/23/19 © fairmount fibers ltd 2019 not to be reproduced or re-knit for profit page 2 of 2
